text: Jack James Earing (born 21 January 1999) is an English footballer who plays for FC Halifax Town as a midfielder. ==Career== ===Club career=== Earing came through Bolton's academy and made his debut for the team on 30 August 2016 when he started in a 2-0 home loss against Everton U-23s in the Football League Trophy Group Stage. On 12 January 2019, Earing was loaned out to Curzon Ashton.Joe Muscatt joins Salford City on loan, bwfc.co.uk, 12 January 2019 On 24 June 2019 it was announced that Earing would be joining F.C. Halifax Town when his Bolton contract expired on 1 July. On 18 December 2019, Earing joined Spennymoor Town on a short-term loan deal.https://spennymoortownfc.co.uk/2019/12/18/earing-brought-in-on-short- term-loan-deal/ On 23 January 2020, Earing joined Farsley Celtic on loan.https://www.farsleyceltic.com/news/jack-earing-joins-the-celt-army-on- loan-2505744.html ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:Footballers from Bury, Greater Manchester Category:Bolton Wanderers F.C. players Category:Curzon Ashton F.C. players Category:FC Halifax Town players Category:Spennymoor Town F.C. players Category:Farsley Celtic F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders Category:English footballers
title: Jack Earing
